entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for September 26, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for September 26, 2024

summary.caption: “And don’t give me that ‘I’m only bird-watching’ line.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for September 26, 2024

summary.caption: “Listen up, my Cossack brethren! We’ll ride into the valley like the wind, the thunder of our horses and the lightning of our steel striking fear in the hearts of our enemies! … And remember—stay out of Mrs. Caldwell’s garden!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for September 26, 2024

summary.caption: “You ever do this? … Just sit in a place like this and antwatch?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for September 26, 2024

summary.caption: “The fuel light’s on, Frank! We’re all going to die! … Wait, wait. … Oh, my mistake—that’s the intercom light.”
